knowledge.name: forest
knowledge.title: The forest was not a place to go for refreshment
knowledge.text: In the world we live in today, "forests" are something to protect and preserve!

knowledge.name: beaver
knowledge.title: A beaver is fish
knowledge.text: The concept of the beaver being a fish became popular among Roman Catholics during the Middle Ages

knowledge.name: hawk
knowledge.title: A hawk, mosquito  and DDT
knowledge.text: Since the 1950s, a chemical called "DDT" has been sprayed in large quantities in areas where infections were spreading in order to control the mosquitoes that transmit yellow fever and malaria.
